recipe.title: Salt-and-Pepper Butter
ingredients: 1 cup (2 sticks) unsalted butter, room temperature
1 teaspoon coarsely ground black pepper plus more
instructions: Using a wooden spoon, mix butter until smooth and creamy. Mix in salt and pepper. Season with more salt and pepper to taste. DO AHEAD: Butter can be made 2 days ahead.
